// src/components/ResetPassword.js
import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{TextField,Button,Container,Typography,Alert}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ResetPassword=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{resetPassword}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await resetPassword(email);navigate('/login');}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{maxWidth:"sm",style:{marginTop:'2rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Reset Password"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{severity:"error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"Email",fullWidth:true,margin:"normal",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"submit",variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,children:"Reset Password"})]})]});};export default ResetPassword;
